__e: In fact, I dropped her off at the bus station not 20 minutes ago.

I spent most of last night hanging around the bus station at Coeur d'Alene; I thought it was gonna be a bust, but then this morning, a couple came up and asked if I was looking for purpose in my life.
The son of a bitch behind the Berlin train bombing, the London bus terminal, and all that stuff that didn't make the papers.
It's just that I met a girl at the bus depot who told me how I could make enough money for a deposit on an apartment, and then I would get, you know, a real job.
Wow. Well... what we have here is a terminal case of overthinking.
But... now that they're, well, you know, dead, and, uh, I have terminal brain cancer, I figure... maybe I should just go for it, you know?
This girl has a terminal heart problem.
He just said to be at the King County Terminal at 7:00.
But now that we were diplomats... In the rush to pick up our equipment in the bus terminal... I didn't have the time to talk to Ángel... and a nightmare became reality.
